content_en:
Website transformer done together with [Nilya Musaeva](https://wishious.de/) as part of her project investigating the web-design of german art universities websites. This website experiment was made by appropriating UI elements of different portal pages, and creating our own Frankenstein website.

[Website](https://these-urls-will-save-the-irl.de/Transformer-website)

[these urls will save the irl main project page](https://these-urls-will-save-the-irl.de/)
title_en: these urls will save the irl
